languages.text: "Эти мерзавцы пособничали изменнику Войгтвиру и были захвачены с оружием в руках. Вина и приговор их были несомненны. Они избежали немедленной казни лишь для того, чтобы кровь нечестивцев пролилась алой дорогой, ведущей Кровавую паутину в твои славные покои".

"Those scoundrels aided the traitor Voigtvir and were caught carrying weapons. Their guilt and sentence were certain. They avoided immediate execution only so that the blood of the wicked could flow in a scarlet trail that led the Bloodspun Web to your glorious halls."
languages.original_text: "Эти мерзавцы пособничали изменнику Войгтвиру и были захвачены с оружием в руках. Вина и приговор их были несомненны. Они избежали немедленной казни лишь для того, чтобы кровь нечестивцев пролилась алой дорогой, ведущей Кровавую паутину в твои славные покои".

traits.locale_text: "These scoundrels aided the traitor Voigtvir and were caught carrying weapons. Their guilt and sentence were certain. They avoided immediate execution only so that the blood of the wicked could flow in a scarlet trail that led the Bloodspun Web to your glorious chambers."

"These scoundrels aided the traitor Voigtvir and were caught carrying weapons. Their guilt and sentence were certain. They avoided immediate execution only so that the blood of the wicked could flow in a scarlet trail that led the Bloodspun Web to your glorious chambers."

"Those scoundrels aided the traitor Voigtvir and were caught carrying weapons. Their guilt and sentence were certain. They avoided immediate execution only so that the blood of the wicked could flow in a scarlet trail that led the Bloodspun Web to your glorious halls."

"Those scoundrels aided the traitor Voigtvir and were caught carrying weapons. Their guilt and sentence were certain. They avoided immediate execution only so that the blood of the wicked could flow in a scarlet trail that led the Bloodspun Web to your glorious halls."

languages.text: « Ces misérables ont aidé le traître Voigtvir et ont été surpris avec des armes sur eux. Leur culpabilité ne faisait aucun doute, et le verdict était sans appel. S'ils n'ont pas été exécutés immédiatement, c'était uniquement pour que le sang des mécréants trace le sentier écarlate qui a mené la Toile de Sang jusque dans vos augustes salles. »
languages.original_text: "Those scoundrels aided the traitor Voigtvir and were caught carrying weapons. Their guilt and sentence were certain. They avoided immediate execution only so that the blood of the wicked could flow in a scarlet trail that led the Bloodspun Web to your glorious halls."

traits.locale_text: « Ces misérables ont aidé le traître Voigtvir et ont été surpris avec des armes sur eux. Leur culpabilité ne faisait aucun doute, et le verdict était sans appel. S'ils n'ont pas été exécutés immédiatement, c'était uniquement pour que le sang des mécréants trace le sentier écarlate qui a mené la Toile de Sang jusque dans vos augustes salles. »

languages.text: «Esos rufianes ayudaron al traidor Voigtvir y se les pilló en posesión de armas. Eran culpables, y la sentencia estaba clara. Evitaron la ejecución inmediata solo porque su rastro de sangre podía conducir a la Red Sanguinolenta hasta sus salones».
languages.original_text: "Those scoundrels aided the traitor Voigtvir and were caught carrying weapons. Their guilt and sentence were certain. They avoided immediate execution only so that the blood of the wicked could flow in a scarlet trail that led the Bloodspun Web to your glorious halls."

traits.locale_text: «Esos rufianes ayudaron al traidor Voigtvir y se les pilló en posesión de armas. Eran culpables, y la sentencia estaba clara. Evitaron la ejecución inmediata solo porque su rastro de sangre podía conducir a la Red Sanguinolenta hasta sus salones».

languages.text: 「あの悪党どもは裏切り者のボイトヴィルに手を貸し、武器を持っていたところを捕まった。彼らの罪と判決は確かだ。彼らは即刻の処刑を免れたが、それは邪悪な者たちの血が緋色の軌跡となって流れ、ブラッドスパン・ウェブをあなたの栄光の広間へと導くためであった」
languages.original_text: "Those scoundrels aided the traitor Voigtvir and were caught carrying weapons. Their guilt and sentence were certain. They avoided immediate execution only so that the blood of the wicked could flow in a scarlet trail that led the Bloodspun Web to your glorious halls."

traits.locale_text: 「あの悪党どもは裏切り者のボイトヴィルに手を貸し、武器を持っていたところを捕まった。彼らの罪と判決は確かだ。彼らは即刻の処刑を免れたが、それは邪悪な者たちの血が緋色の軌跡となって流れ、ブラッドスパン・ウェブをあなたの栄光の広間へと導くためであった」

languages.text: “那些恶徒协助维特威尔那个叛徒，还违法携带武器，被抓了现行。他们的罪行确凿无疑，他们的判决公平公正。我们没有当场处决他们，仅仅是为了让这些恶徒的鲜血流成猩红色的血河，将织血罗网引向你光荣的殿堂。”
languages.original_text: "Those scoundrels aided the traitor Voigtvir and were caught carrying weapons. Their guilt and sentence were certain. They avoided immediate execution only so that the blood of the wicked could flow in a scarlet trail that led the Bloodspun Web to your glorious halls."

traits.locale_text: “那些恶徒协助维特威尔那个叛徒，还违法携带武器，被抓了现行。他们的罪行确凿无疑，他们的判决公平公正。我们没有当场处决他们，仅仅是为了让这些恶徒的鲜血流成猩红色的血河，将织血罗网引向你光荣的殿堂。”

languages.text: "Dieses Gesindel hat dem Verräter Voigtvir geholfen und war bewaffnet. Schuld und Urteil waren eindeutig. Sie wurden nur deshalb nicht sofort exekutiert, damit das Blut der Ruchlosen das Blutgesponnene Netz in Eure ruhmreichen Hallen führen konnte."
languages.original_text: "Those scoundrels aided the traitor Voigtvir and were caught carrying weapons. Their guilt and sentence were certain. They avoided immediate execution only so that the blood of the wicked could flow in a scarlet trail that led the Bloodspun Web to your glorious halls."

traits.locale_text: "Dieses Gesindel hat dem Verräter Voigtvir geholfen und war bewaffnet. Schuld und Urteil waren eindeutig. Sie wurden nur deshalb nicht sofort exekutiert, damit das Blut der Ruchlosen das Blutgesponnene Netz in Eure ruhmreichen Hallen führen konnte."

languages.text: "O alçaklar, hain Voigtvir'e yardım etti ve silah taşırken yakalandı. Suçları ve cezaları mutlak. Oracıkta infaz edilmekten kurtulmalarının tek nedeni, menfurların kanının kan kızılı bir yol olup Kanipi Ağı'nı ihtişamlı salonlarına yönlendirerek akmasını sağlamaktı."
languages.original_text: "Those scoundrels aided the traitor Voigtvir and were caught carrying weapons. Their guilt and sentence were certain. They avoided immediate execution only so that the blood of the wicked could flow in a scarlet trail that led the Bloodspun Web to your glorious halls."
